org.sakaiproject.coursemanagement.impl.provider

Class CourseManagementGroupProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.coursemanagement.impl.provider.CourseManagementGroupProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupProvider

    public class CourseManagementGroupProvider
extends Object
implements GroupProvider
    A Sakai GroupProvider that utilizes the CourseManagementService and the CmMappingService to supply authz data to Sakai. This implementation uses a list of RoleResolvers, which can be used to resolve a user's role in a section based on memberships in parent objects such as CourseSets.

    • Method Detail

      • getRole

        public String getRole(String id,
             String user)
        This method is not longer in use in Sakai. It should be removed from the GroupProvider interface.
        Specified by:
        getRole in interface GroupProvider
        Parameters:
        id - The external group id.
        user - The user Id.
        Returns:
        the role name for this particular user in the external group, or null if none.

      • getUserRolesForGroup

        public Map<String,String> getUserRolesForGroup(String id)
        Provides a Map of user IDs to (Sakai) roles for the Course Section EIDs specified in the input AuthzGroup provider string.
        Specified by:
        getUserRolesForGroup in interface GroupProvider
        Parameters:
        id - The external group id. This will need to be unpacked if the provider supports packing. This may be null if the context doesn't have a provider ID set..
        Returns:
        the user id - role name map for all users in the external group, if id isn't found or is null then an empty collection should be returned.

      • getGroupRolesForUser

        public Map<String,String> getGroupRolesForUser(String userEid)
        Provides a map of Course Section EIDs (which can be used as AuthzGroup provider IDs) to Sakai roles for a given user.
        Specified by:
        getGroupRolesForUser in interface GroupProvider
        Parameters:
        userEid - The user id.
        Returns:
        the the external group id - role name map for this users in all external groups. (may be empty).

      • unpackId

        public String[] unpackId(String id)
        Description copied from interface: GroupProvider
        Unpack a possibly compound id into it's component ids, returning at least the id unchanged if not compound.
        Specified by:
        unpackId in interface GroupProvider
        Parameters:
        id - The external realm id. This may be null.
        Returns:
        a String array of one or more ids upacked from this possibly compound id, if null was supplied return an empty array.

        public String preferredRole(String one,

        Description copied from interface: GroupProvider
        Return one or the other of these role names - pick the one that if a user has both, is the more powerful one to give the user as their single role.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        one - A role name. May be null!
        other - Another role name. May be null!
        Returns:

        public boolean groupExists(String groupId)
        Description copied from interface: GroupProvider
        Does the provider know of the existence of the linked group? This method should return true for groups that have no members but are valid
        Specified by:
        groupExists in interface GroupProvider
        Returns:
